daily_analysis.reasoning: Broader daily chart (30-50 candles) shows clear higher highs and higher lows (strong uptrend). On the rightmost area there is a recent large green candle that fully engulfs the prior small red candle near the current price — a bullish engulfing at a support area. Zone trimmed to a tight 20-30 pip core range near current price.

m30_analysis.reasoning: A clear bullish (green) M30 candle significantly engulfs the prior red candle near the 4108.7–4109 daily zone. Zone marked wick-to-wick and narrowed to 4107.0–4109.5 (2.5 price units, within 20–30 pip requirement) to focus on the actionable overlap; momentum continuation follows. Pattern is acceptable though not a textbook full-wick engulf in every detail.
